creditline: Lent by the Design Museum Helsinki
description:
cardboard box with lid; teal in color with image of a tree with yellow and green leaves; filled with baby clothes and accessories

DM 40881:

[1] box and lid
[2] toy: green and yellow teether with ring and three bumps
[3] book
[4] thermometer: in white plastic surround
[5] hair brush: cream in color with brown bristles
[6] mattress cover: white towel material lined in plastic
[7] foam mattress
[8] tights: cream colored
[9] socks and mittens; cream and orange with image of a tiger (all numbered with 9, image list from Design Museum show socks as 9 and mittens as 10)
[11] shirt: white long sleeves with grey and brown elephant print
[11b] leggings: grey no feet
[12] body suit: zip-up, no feet, cream color
[13] body suit: zip-up, with feet, tan stripe with mouse and bear
[14] onesie: white long sleeved kimono style with tie
[15] onesie: long sleeves with teal tent pattern
[15b] overalls: with feet, no sleeves, teal tent pattern
[16] hat: white fitted hat with ties
[17] onesie: long sleeves with orange and grey horizontal stripe
[18] leggings: teal, with feet
[19] overalls: no feet, no sleeves, solid orange in color
[20] overalls: with feet, no sleeves, horizontal blue, green, yellow and white stripe
[21] leggings: orange with white dots, no feet
[22] leggings: white, no feet
[23] onesie: white long sleeves
[24] leggings: white, with feet
[25] overalls: with feet, no sleeves, white with pandas
[26] onesie: white long sleeves
[27] light quilted snowsuit: tan in color with brown owls (image list from Design Museum show suit as number 43 with no object as number 27)
[28] snowsuit: grey with cream colored bunny
[28b] hat: cream colored knit hat with three balls on top and reflective strip
[28c] insulated mittens: grey
[28d] insulated bootees: grey
[29] towel: white
[30] sheet: cream with multi colored frog print
[31] bib: brown with yellow spots, white piping
[32] sleeping bag quilt: grey with hedgehogs in white, yellow and green
[33] duvet: cream in color
[34] sheet: white
[35] c
title: The Finnish Baby Box
